messages.title: ACROSS HULL AND THE UK THE LIBERAL DEMOCRATS ARE WINNING
messages.content: The Lib Dems fightback is real - and it’s changing everything.

mentions.candidate: The Lib Dems fightback is real - and it’s changing everything.
mentions.partyLeader: Recent polls show support for the Liberal Democrats is now at record levels and Jo Swinson is the most popular party leader.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Overall the Lib Dems attracted 15,968 votes in Hull compared to Labour's tally of 14,873... it bodes well for next year's elections.

endorsements.endorsement: The Lib Dem fightback is real - and it’s changing everything.
